title: What ever happened to those halloween "Slayer" skins?
body:
I saw a lot of posts about these slayer skins but now it seems like Riot just skipped halloween this year?
Anyone have any info on this?

replies.body: I saw someone with Slayer Jinx in a game this morning
they skipped halloween. Because OCE isn't that big of a believer in it?
That's bullsht, I've never lived in a place that wasn't crawling with trick-r-treaters  and covered in decorations on halloween...
zombies don't exist, so riot isn't going to make slayers :)
He was joking, They'll be later this week. A video was actually just put up on the Main feature in the client but taken down quite fast that said "Now Playing: Zombie Slayer!"
